tags.name: purple_border_background
tags.description: Creates a custom ninesliced Minecraft purple border background, the same one used for item hover text in Minecraft.

tags.name: autofill_from_file
tags.description: Replaces its contents with the component generated by the specified file.

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: The path to the JavaScript file that contains the getComponent function to generate the component's HTML content.

tags.name: only_visible_on_themes
tags.description: Makes all elements inside of it only visible when one of the specified themes in active.
